body.p:
I am in Marion today and have Just finished a speach and have to go from this to Madisonville whilst here I learned that three of my friends towit D A Butler J S Lowey & W B Travis at the last term of the circuit court was fined in the agregate $125000 the particulars I suppose will be detaled in other letters and from what I have learned I for an assault and from what I learn the fine was excessive and in fact but a very small fine if any should have been imposed and I am satisfied that it is a case that calls for the
executive clemency I would therefore request as a favour that you remit the fine except cost the parties having stated as I understand the portion due the Comths Atty which of itself I believe to be a heavy fine

Respectfully
Your Obedt
Servant
H. C. Burnett
